abstract: Google expands the availability of Wave, a new communications tool that is one of its most anticipated products of the year.
snippet: Google expands the availability of Wave, a new communications tool that is one of its most anticipated products of the year.
lead_paragraph: Google Wave is one of the most anticipated new products to come out of Google this year. Technology blogs have been abuzz with excitement about this new communications and collaboration tool since Google first showcased it in May.

headline.main: Google’s Much-Anticipated Wave Opens Up a Bit
